pros: It was an amazing place to work. My coworkers were so caring and supportive.

review_title: Avoid this hospital at all costs, for work and for any care for you or your family. Seriously!
pros: There are a very (VERY) select few staff whom actually care about patients, none of whom work in leadership.
cons: Lack of true leadership. Lack of integrity. Lack of pride in their work. Lack of accountability. Focus is on money and fiscal gain. Corners are cut. Physicians have zero accountability for extremely poor patient care. Upper management plays favorites to the point its so obvious but they dont care. Upper management plays stupid and uniformed when they make mistakes instead of taking accountability and fixing it, which is just astonishing to witness. Leadership dictates with fear tactics and a "do as I say not as I do" attitude. Nursing leadership is an absolute cancer to that hospital and the people at the very top allow it all to take place, as they are completely out of touch with what even goes on at their own hospital. They care more about how they look in the community vs actually caring for the community. A bunch of actors!
Micro management when you don't do what they want

pros: Friendly atmosphere. Great collaboration between departments.
cons: Communication is lacking at times, but improving.

pros: Good pay good work good hours
cons: Short staffed bigger areas than other

job_title: Patient Service Representative in Sidney, OH
pros: Great place to work, good people, would recommend.
cons: There wasn't any cons that stood out to me.

job_title: IT Network Manager in Sidney, OH
pros: Smaller Hospital where everyone knows one another. Opportunity for growth if desired. Excellent pay structure.
cons: I do not have any cons at the moment

pros: Decent benefits package, although every year it becomes less so. Some co-workers and doctors are great to work with, like you will find at any hospital.
cons: Nepotism runs rampant here. Positions created for people with ties to managers and doctors. Many in management got those positions in much the same way. Education and experience aren't valued, little chance for advancement here.

review_title: Great place to work!  I've been here 6 years and would highly recommend.
pros: Caring, experienced professionals in all departments.  Great people work here. Patients and family members are #1 and receive quality care.  Everyone works as a team.  It has that family feel.
cons: pay could be reviewed for improvement

pros: You can feel the community culture - everyone knows each other and are genuinely happy to see one another. It makes coming into work nice.
cons: Sometimes it feels there are multiple road blocks to get through to get small items accomplished.

pros: All of your coworkers are like family. Benefits and pay are great compared to like organizations.
cons: Sometimes decisions are slow to be made.

job_title: Laboratory and Respiratory Director in Piqua, OH
pros: Family feel with pleasant co-workers that make it very enjoyable to work at. Wilson is independent with great ties to the community.
cons: Landlocked making it difficult to grow

review_title: Great experience at Wilson Memorial Hospital.
cons: There were no cons to working at Wilson Memorial Hospital.

pros: The people that work at Wilson are friendly.
cons: There is not much room to move up in the company.

pros: Small, community hospital. Good benefits for its size.
cons: Needs new nurse management. Good nurses are all leaving. Beware!
